headline: 3 Giant Tech Stocks That Initiated Dividends This Year
summary: As celebrated as some of the more famous tech stocks are, they're almost never renowned for paying dividends.  Three companies that initiated dividends in 2024 are among the cream of the crop in the sector -- Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOGL)(NASDAQ: GOOG), Meta Platforms (NASDAQ: META), and Salesforce (NYSE: CRM).  Let's do a quick drive-by on each of these three dividend newcomers.
